name: Product Personalization for WC
author: Pawan Priyadarshi

sections.description:
This is an awesome plugin to quickly give your customers ability to personalize your products. People really like personalised items at their home especially children. This plugin add field like Printed Name, Font and Font Colors, Sample image etc.
You can easily install and setup these field from your WordPress admin panel.
You can choose different labels for Printed Name.
You can add several font options in the backend which the customers will see when they will choose the personalisation checkbox on the product pages.
You can add several color options using the color picker in the backend.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Does it only work with woocommerce?

Yes, It only works with woocommerce.

How can I get support for this plugin if there is an issue?

Please share your issue with screenshots and we will try to resolve the issues within 2-3 business days.

How can I donate for this plugin?

Please Donate on my PayPal link- https://paypal.me/PawanPriyadarshi?locale.x=en_GB

short_description: Allow customers to personalize the products. It will allow customer to provide the printed Name, choose font, color and check a sample image.
